name: Chase of Pirates
description:
Chase of Pirates

  • Source code: [HERE] (MIT license: Mohammad Ebrahimi)
Story

You are the greatest captain of all Britain army. Pirates want to destroy your ship to attack your cities!

Keys

Hold left key = Fire cannon

Right click = Back to main menu

Clouds will show you the wind speed
